attributes.action: Make covid testing of the healthy people illegal
attributes.additional_details: We need the government to step in and stop this waste of money since when ever have we tested healthy people
attributes.background: Make covid testing of the healthy people illegal stop the covid testing of healthy people and spend the money on the NHS

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about the testing of people to determine whether they have Covid-19.

However, it's not clear what you mean by 'healthy' people i.e. whether you want this to apply to asymptomatic people (those who do not display Covid-19 symptoms), people who have previously tested negative for Covid-19, or some other group.

You could have a petition calling on the Government to remove Covid-19 testing requirements for asymptomatic people, if that is something you'd like to see happen.
